pyecharts.charts.basic_charts.pie
=================================

.. py:module:: pyecharts.charts.basic_charts.pie


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   pyecharts.charts.basic_charts.pie.Pie


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: Pie(init_opts: pyecharts.types.Init = opts.InitOpts(), render_opts: pyecharts.types.RenderInit = opts.RenderOpts())

   Bases: :py:obj:`pyecharts.charts.chart.Chart`


   <<< Pie >>>

   The pie chart is mainly used to represent the proportion of data of
   different categories in the total. Each radian represents the ratio of
   the number of data points.


   .. py:method:: add(series_name: str, data_pair: pyecharts.types.Sequence[pyecharts.types.Union[pyecharts.types.Sequence, pyecharts.options.PieItem, dict]], *, color: pyecharts.types.Optional[str] = None, color_by: pyecharts.types.Optional[str] = 'data', is_legend_hover_link: bool = True, selected_mode: pyecharts.types.Union[str, bool] = False, selected_offset: pyecharts.types.Numeric = 10, radius: pyecharts.types.Optional[pyecharts.types.Sequence] = None, center: pyecharts.types.Optional[pyecharts.types.Sequence] = None, rosetype: pyecharts.types.Union[str, bool] = None, is_clockwise: bool = True, start_angle: pyecharts.types.Numeric = 90, min_angle: pyecharts.types.Numeric = 0, min_show_label_angle: pyecharts.types.Numeric = 0, is_avoid_label_overlap: bool = True, is_still_show_zero_sum: bool = True, percent_precision: pyecharts.types.Numeric = 2, is_show_empty_circle: bool = True, empty_circle_style_opts: pyecharts.types.PieEmptyCircle = opts.PieEmptyCircleStyle(), label_opts: pyecharts.types.Label = opts.LabelOpts(), label_line_opts: pyecharts.types.PieLabelLine = opts.PieLabelLineOpts(), tooltip_opts: pyecharts.types.Tooltip = None, itemstyle_opts: pyecharts.types.ItemStyle = None, emphasis_opts: pyecharts.types.Emphasis = None, encode: pyecharts.types.Union[pyecharts.types.JSFunc, dict, None] = None, markpoint_opts: pyecharts.types.MarkPoint = None, markline_opts: pyecharts.types.MarkLine = None, markarea_opts: pyecharts.types.MarkArea = None)
